name: A Most Dangerous Love
description:
Pardon the jank and the bits that don't work.

Summary-Samantha Rainsford, a hunter and her best friend Whitney are on a  trip to the Caribbean for a week of relaxation and gossip, when Sam falls overboard during a freakish flash storm and is forced to swim over to the closest land mass, simply known as “Ship Trap Island”. After a while of swimming and searching the island, she finds the vacation home of a young Russian aristocrat simply known as Master Zaroff that proposes the game to her. If she can survive the 3 days shes being hunted, not only does she get to keep her life, but also gets his hand in marriage. Will she survive?
